about_the_game:
Start with a plot of land nestled in the mountains of Uagrall and build a city that will withstand the trials that mortals and gods will send your way.

Features

  • []Build your city with a wide choice of buildings alone or with your friends.
    []Make your citizens thrive by providing them with all the resources they will need.
    []Develop your army to defeat your enemies.
    []Appease the gods to benefit from their blessing.
    []Summon heroes to defeat fantastical creatures.
    []Construct monuments and watch your prestige rise.

Play with your friends

In Ulia Chronicles, the multiplayer mode lets you enjoy a unique cooperative experience. Work together to build thriving cities, defend your lands from formidable invasions, or face mythical creatures as a team. Whether you're exploring as a duo or with a larger group, every session becomes a new adventure where strategy and teamwork are the keys to survival in this fantastical world!

Explore this new world

Through the different scenarios of a campaign composed of 20 chapters, explore the highlights that have shaped history. You will embody the leader of various tribes in turn and must build the most important cities on these plateaus. Each of your creations will leave a mark on history for better or for worse. You must triumph over the trials that stand in your way in order to make your citizens thrive and lead them into a new era of peace. Barbarians, gods, and monsters will try by all means to prevent you from fulfilling your destiny.

Build your city

Arrange road networks and position your structures along them to ensure access to various services. Harvest resources to transform them into manufactured goods. Meet the needs of your citizens and soldiers to improve their lives and equipment. Take advantage of your surpluses to engage in lucrative trade transactions with your neighbors. To do this, you must set up an efficient storage network to organize the distribution of your goods. Seize every moment to observe this ever-moving world with the sole purpose of obeying your commands.

Protect your village

To ensure the safety of your citizens, you may sometimes need to resort to forceful methods. Your enemies will not hesitate to bring war within your walls if they sense you are in trouble or if the mood strikes them. You will have to face invaders from distant lands and have no choice but to prevail. Conversely, you can also leverage the armed might of your forces to accomplish your will and dominate neighboring cities that resist.

Honor the gods

Build gigantic monuments to the glory of your gods, or else beware their wrath. If a god takes a dislike to you, they will unleash a powerful monster capable of completely destroying your city. No soldier or archer in your army could defeat it. Your only hope will lie in the intervention of one of the heroes who roam Uagrall.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 @ 3.5 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1600x @ 3.6 GHz or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ulia Chronicles is a city-building game set in a fantasy universe. Build your city, gather resources, and make your citizens thrive. Play alone or with your friends in this game inspired by the classics of the genre.
